name: Spookie's Sweetzaria
description: Spookie's Sweetzaria is a short game where you make delicious dessert pizzas for hungry ghosts while the conveyer pushes them out. Make the pizzas your customer wants and you'll earn some 'dough', but if you can't deliver, they may just float on over to that nice Chinese place down the block. Can you keep up with the lunch rush? Or will your business crash and fail?
